Title: Voice Dominion - Voice / Speech Recognition Home Automation
Description: Voice Dominion allows you to control your ISY 994i Home Automation system using speech recognition. It also uses speech synthesis to confirm your commands.
HomeWiki:
Voice Dominion
Voice Dominion allows you to control your ISY 994i Home Automation system using speech recognition. It also uses speech synthesis to confirm your commands.

This project is in its very early changes. Any code which I check in might be incomplete.

Examples of speech recognition commands:
- Computer, turn on the bedroom lights
- Corner office lights off

Requirements to run it:
- A Windows PC with .NET 4
- ISY 994i with Insteon hardware (tested with firmware 4.0.5)
- A decent microphone (this is crucial!)

Requirements to build it:
- Microsoft Visual Studio Express 2013 for Windows Desktop
- StyleCop v4.7
